title: How do I enter and exit safe mode?
answer:
When your phone is powering on and the power-on animation disappears, touch and hold the volume down key until Safe mode appears on the lower left corner of the screen. 

 To exit the safe mode, restart your phone. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110923)
